Name: Surge Consumable
Description:
Manufacturer: Thermyte Concern
Item Type: Mining Consumable

Total Charge Level: +40%
Shatter Damage: +200%
Overcharge Rate: +100%
Duration: Instant
Charges: 5

Instantly inject energy into a deposit with the Surge. This consumable combines with a mining laser to deliver a burst of power that immediately fills part of the current charge window whilst simultaneously destabilizing it, increasing the Shatter Damage and Catastrophic Charge Rate making it dangerous to fail with.
